item.title: Recitations
item.description: The Recitations are from the course textbook: Apostol, Tom M. Calculus, Volume 1: One-Variable Calculus, with An Introduction to Linear Algebra. Waltham, Mass: Blaisdell, 1967. ISBN: 9780471000051. RECÂ # ASSIGNMENTS 1 Pg 16: 10, 15, 18 2 Pg 18: prove Th’m I.9, I.10; pg 19: 4 3 Prove Th’m I.24; pp 35-36: 1a,11; pg 40: 6, 11 4 A.9:3; pg 28: 3; pg 43: 1achi 5 Pg 57: 9abc, 11; pg 63:1ab, 4a 6 Pg 70: 1bcde, 2,3; prove theorem 1.
